CloseButton.tsx.name: CloseButton
CloseButton.tsx.description: Simple close button with X icon for modals and dialogs
CloseButton.tsx.notes: MOVED TO PLATFORM_SPECIFIC: Uses CloseButton.scss with absolute positioning. FontAwesome dependency. Easier to build native version with Icon primitive.

Loading.tsx.name: Loading
Loading.tsx.description: Animated loading spinner with customizable appearance
Loading.tsx.notes: Simple animation component. Logic is just props passing - no extraction needed. Platform difference in animation implementation (CSS vs React Native Animated).

EmptyDirectMessage.tsx.name: EmptyDirectMessage
EmptyDirectMessage.tsx.description: Empty state screen for direct messages with welcome content
EmptyDirectMessage.tsx.notes: Business logic extracted to useShowHomeScreen hook for localStorage toggle states. All HTML elements replaced with primitives (Container, FlexRow, FlexColumn, Text, Icon). Removed unused imports and commented code. useConversationsData was determined unnecessary and removed. Still uses DirectMessage.scss so remains platform_specific.

Layout.tsx.name: Layout
Layout.tsx.description: Main app layout container with modals and navigation
Layout.tsx.notes: Business logic extracted to useModalManagement (createSpace modal state) and useElectronDetection (platform detection for CloseButton). Added Container primitive for conditional rendering. Component simplified from 60+ lines to ~40 lines with clean hook composition. Much simpler than originally estimated - no complex useEffect or state interactions found.

Channel.tsx.name: Channel
Channel.tsx.description: Main channel view with messages, input, and interactions
Channel.tsx.notes: 800+ lines with multiple useState/useEffect, API calls, complex business rules. Massive extraction needed: useMessages, useChannelData, useFileUpload, useMessageComposer.

SearchBar.tsx.name: SearchBar
SearchBar.tsx.description: Search input with suggestions and keyboard navigation
SearchBar.tsx.notes: Business logic extracted to 3 hooks. Uses only primitives but still has custom SCSS file with styling classes.

ModalProvider.tsx.name: ModalProvider
ModalProvider.tsx.description: Context provider for managing all modal state using useReducer pattern
ModalProvider.tsx.notes: Contains modal state management logic (reducer, actions, initial state) that should be extracted to useModalState hook. Renders modal components directly with web-specific CSS classes (z-[9999], fixed positioning). Business logic: modal opening/closing coordination, state management (>10 lines, reusable). Replaces AppWithSearch modal functionality.

MobileProvider.tsx.name: MobileProvider
MobileProvider.tsx.description: Context provider for managing mobile-specific drawer components with animations
MobileProvider.tsx.notes: Contains mobile drawer state management logic (reducer, animation timing with 300ms setTimeout delays, closing state sequences) that should be extracted to useMobileDrawerState hook. Renders drawers with web-specific CSS. Business logic: drawer animations, timing management (>10 lines, reusable).

SidebarProvider.tsx.name: SidebarProvider
SidebarProvider.tsx.description: Context provider for managing right sidebar visibility and content
SidebarProvider.tsx.notes: Contains sidebar state management logic that should be extracted to useSidebarState hook. Renders sidebar with web-specific CSS classes (fixed positioning, transitions, lg:hidden responsive). Business logic: sidebar visibility management (reusable).

Elements.tsx.name: Elements
Elements.tsx.description: Design system showcase/testing page for UI elements
Elements.tsx.notes: Development showcase component. Likely just renders UI elements - no complex logic to extract. Keep simple display logic in component.

KickUserModal.tsx.name: KickUserModal
KickUserModal.tsx.description: Modal for kicking users from spaces with confirmation flow
KickUserModal.tsx.notes: COMPLETED: Business logic extracted into useUserKicking hook with confirmation flow, timeout management, and kick user API calls. All raw HTML replaced with Container, Text, FlexRow primitives. Fully cross-platform compatible with responsive text alignment. TODO: Verify mobile UX in playground - confirm shared modal works well on mobile vs needing platform-specific native implementation.

UserSettingsModal.tsx.name: UserSettingsModal
UserSettingsModal.tsx.description: Complex user settings modal with multiple tabs and configuration options
UserSettingsModal.tsx.notes: Complex settings with API calls, file upload, validation (>10 lines each). Extract: useUserSettings, useProfileImage, useThemeSettings, useLocaleSettings.

SpaceButton.tsx.name: SpaceButton
SpaceButton.tsx.description: Draggable space navigation button with selection state
SpaceButton.tsx.notes: COMPLETED: Analyzed for business logic extraction but intentionally kept simple and explicit. Logic too minimal to extract (2-3 lines: selection state, URL generation). Uses @dnd-kit/sortable for web drag/drop. Will need .native.tsx version with different gesture system (long-press vs drag). Removed SCSS dependency, using Tailwind 'block' class. Best practice: Don't over-engineer simple components - clarity over abstraction. Platform-specific behavior (drag/drop) belongs in platform files, not shared hooks.

QuickReactionButton.tsx.name: QuickReactionButton
QuickReactionButton.tsx.description: Touch-friendly emoji reaction button with visual feedback
QuickReactionButton.tsx.notes: MOVED TO PLATFORM_SPECIFIC: Uses custom CSS classes for hover/touch feedback. Touch/hover behavior differs between web/native. Easier to build native version.

UserProfile.tsx.name: UserProfile
UserProfile.tsx.description: User profile display with role management and actions
UserProfile.tsx.notes: Business logic extracted into 3 focused hooks. Uses primitives (Container, FlexRow, Text, Icon, Button) but still has UserProfile.scss with custom CSS classes. Platform-specific due to SCSS dependency.

UserProfileEdit.tsx.name: UserProfileEdit
UserProfileEdit.tsx.description: User profile edit mode with image upload and profile updates
UserProfileEdit.tsx.notes: Edit mode functionality extracted from UserProfile. Currently unused but kept for potential future use.

DirectMessageContact.tsx.name: DirectMessageContact
DirectMessageContact.tsx.description: Contact list item for direct messages with unread indicators
DirectMessageContact.tsx.notes: MOVED TO PLATFORM_SPECIFIC: Uses DirectMessageContact.scss with custom styling for contact list items, unread indicators. Easier to build native version.

NavMenu.tsx.name: NavMenu
NavMenu.tsx.description: Main navigation menu with drag-and-drop space reordering
NavMenu.tsx.notes: Business logic extracted to useSpaceOrdering (space deduplication, mapping, persistence) and useSpaceDragAndDrop (drag state, reordering, config saving). Primitives NOT used - complex CSS layout with glow effects, selection indicators, and precise spacing breaks when converted to primitives. Original HTML + SCSS preserved for visual integrity. Hooks are cross-platform ready for future native implementation.

CreateSpaceModal.tsx.name: CreateSpaceModal
CreateSpaceModal.tsx.description: Modal for creating new spaces with advanced settings and file upload
CreateSpaceModal.tsx.notes: MOVED TO PLATFORM_SPECIFIC: Heavy Tailwind dependencies, raw divs, complex file upload UI, SCSS classes. Complex modal with many custom CSS behaviors. Easier to build native version.

MessageList.tsx.name: MessageList
MessageList.tsx.description: Virtualized message list with infinite scrolling and window management
MessageList.tsx.notes: MOVED TO PLATFORM_SPECIFIC: Uses react-virtuoso (web-specific virtualization). React Native needs FlatList. Different scrolling/virtualization implementations required per platform.

AccentColorSwitcher.tsx.name: AccentColorSwitcher
AccentColorSwitcher.tsx.description: Color palette selector for theme accent colors
AccentColorSwitcher.tsx.notes: COMPLETED: Business logic extracted into useAccentColor hook with platform-aware storage (localStorage for web, AsyncStorage ready for native). Now uses FlexRow primitive instead of raw div. Component uses only primitives (FlexRow, ColorSwatch) with platform-aware sizing logic. Fully cross-platform compatible.

Connecting.tsx.name: Connecting
Connecting.tsx.description: Loading splash screen with animated icon and connecting message
Connecting.tsx.notes: Simple splash screen with no business logic (<5 lines). Animation differs per platform but no logic extraction needed.

Maintenance.tsx.name: Maintenance
Maintenance.tsx.description: Maintenance mode display with icon and message
Maintenance.tsx.notes: MOVED TO PLATFORM_SPECIFIC: Heavy Tailwind usage with raw divs throughout (flex flex-col grow, etc.). Simple maintenance display (<5 lines of logic).

ClickToCopyContent.tsx.name: ClickToCopyContent
ClickToCopyContent.tsx.description: Utility component for copy-to-clipboard functionality with tooltip
ClickToCopyContent.tsx.notes: COMPLETED: Business logic extracted into useCopyToClipboard hook with platform-aware clipboard handling. Now uses only primitives (Container, Icon, Text, Tooltip) but remains platform_specific due to complex web-specific touch event handling with manual DOM event listeners for mobile web UX. Native version would use different touch patterns and native clipboard APIs.

ThemeRadioGroup.tsx.name: ThemeRadioGroup
ThemeRadioGroup.tsx.description: Radio button group for selecting light/dark theme modes
ThemeRadioGroup.tsx.notes: MOVED TO PLATFORM_SPECIFIC: Uses Tailwind className. Theme selection logic with localStorage integration (>10 lines, reusable). Already extracted: useThemeSelection.

ReactTooltip.tsx.name: ReactTooltip
ReactTooltip.tsx.description: Legacy tooltip wrapper - should migrate to Tooltip primitive
ReactTooltip.tsx.notes: MOVED TO PLATFORM_SPECIFIC: Uses ReactTooltip.scss, web-specific tooltip library. Native needs different tooltip implementation. Should migrate to Tooltip primitive.

Container.tsx.name: Container
Container.tsx.description: Legacy container component with custom styling
Container.tsx.notes: MOVED TO PLATFORM_SPECIFIC: Legacy class component with Container.scss dependencies. Should migrate to Container primitive instead of porting.

UnknownAvatar.tsx.name: UnknownAvatar
UnknownAvatar.tsx.description: SVG avatar placeholder for unknown users
UnknownAvatar.tsx.notes: MOVED TO PLATFORM_SPECIFIC: Uses Tailwind classes, raw divs. Unused component. SVG handling differs between web/native. Easier to build native version when needed.

DirectMessage.tsx.name: DirectMessage
DirectMessage.tsx.description: Full direct message conversation view with file upload and interactions
DirectMessage.tsx.notes: Large component with file upload, dropzone, message actions. Complex state management with multiple useEffect/useState. Similar to Channel.tsx - needs breakdown.

DirectMessages.tsx.name: DirectMessages
DirectMessages.tsx.description: Direct messages layout container with contacts list and conversation
DirectMessages.tsx.notes: Layout component managing DM contacts and conversation view. Uses responsive context. Desktop: sidebar + main. Mobile: stack navigation.

ActionMenuItem.tsx.name: ActionMenuItem
ActionMenuItem.tsx.description: Reusable action menu item for mobile drawer actions
ActionMenuItem.tsx.notes: MOVED TO PLATFORM_SPECIFIC: Uses FontAwesome (@fortawesome/react-fontawesome) and custom CSS classes (action-menu-item). Simple menu item with icon, label, onClick.

MessageActionsDrawer.tsx.name: MessageActionsDrawer
MessageActionsDrawer.tsx.description: Mobile drawer with message action buttons (reply, delete, reactions)
MessageActionsDrawer.tsx.notes: Uses MobileDrawer component. Designed for mobile-first UX. Desktop equivalent likely uses hover/context menu. Simple action handlers.

UserStatus.tsx.name: UserStatus
UserStatus.tsx.description: User status display with avatar, name, and online indicator
UserStatus.tsx.notes: MOVED TO PLATFORM_SPECIFIC: Imports './UserStatus.scss'. Uses ClickToCopyContent component and partially uses primitives. Has SCSS dependencies.

UserOnlineStateIndicator.tsx.name: UserOnlineStateIndicator
UserOnlineStateIndicator.tsx.description: Simple online status indicator with color coding
UserOnlineStateIndicator.tsx.notes: MOVED TO PLATFORM_SPECIFIC: Uses UserOnlineStateIndicator.scss with custom styling. Simple component but has CSS dependencies. Easier to build native version.

Space.tsx.name: Space
Space.tsx.description: Space layout container with channel list and main channel view
Space.tsx.notes: Layout component managing space view. Uses responsive context. Desktop: sidebar + main. Mobile: stack/tab navigation. Simple layout logic.

SpaceIcon.tsx.name: SpaceIcon
SpaceIcon.tsx.description: Space icon display with image loading, tooltip, and drag-aware behavior
SpaceIcon.tsx.notes: COMPLETED: Business logic extracted into useImageLoading hook with ArrayBuffer/URL image loading, loading states, and error handling. Now uses Tooltip primitive instead of direct ReactTooltip. Added drag-aware tooltip management - disables tooltips during space icon dragging for better UX. Remains platform_specific due to SpaceIcon.scss dependency with custom CSS classes (space-icon-selected, space-icon-has-notifs) and responsive breakpoints. Web version cannot use Container primitive - must use raw div elements to maintain CSS class compatibility with existing SCSS. Component demonstrates excellent pattern: shared business logic with platform-specific styling coordination.

ChannelGroup.tsx.name: ChannelGroup
ChannelGroup.tsx.description: Channel group container with channels list and admin controls
ChannelGroup.tsx.notes: MOVED TO PLATFORM_SPECIFIC: Uses ChannelGroup.scss, FontAwesome icons, raw Link elements. Different navigation patterns for web/native. Easier to build native version.

ChannelList.tsx.name: ChannelList
ChannelList.tsx.description: Full channel list with groups, admin controls, and actions
ChannelList.tsx.notes: COMPLETED: Business logic extracted into 4 focused hooks - useGroupEditor (modal state), useSpacePermissions (owner/member logic), useSpaceHeader (banner/styling), useSpaceGroups (data processing). All HTML elements replaced with primitives (Container, Button, Icon, Text). Removed unused useSpaceMembers import and cleaned up TypeScript warnings. Modal system updated to use primitives with proper Container wrapper instead of raw divs. Still uses ChannelList.scss so remains platform_specific.

InviteLink.tsx.name: InviteLink
InviteLink.tsx.description: Invite link preview and join functionality component
InviteLink.tsx.notes: COMPLETED: Business logic extracted into 3 focused hooks - useInviteProcessing (invite validation), useInviteJoining (space joining with passkey validation), useInviteUI (button states, membership checking). All HTML elements replaced with primitives (Container, Text, FlexRow, Button). Simplified error display using Text with variant='error'. Improved error handling with separate validation and join errors. Hook designed specifically for fixed invite link use case (vs general useSpaceJoining for dynamic links).

NewDirectMessageModal.tsx.name: NewDirectMessageModal
NewDirectMessageModal.tsx.description: Modal for starting new direct message conversations
NewDirectMessageModal.tsx.notes: COMPLETED: Business logic extracted into useDirectMessageCreation and useAddressValidation hooks. All raw HTML replaced with Container and Text primitives. Fully cross-platform compatible. TODO: Verify mobile UX in playground - confirm shared modal works well on mobile vs needing platform-specific native implementation.

JoinSpaceModal.tsx.name: JoinSpaceModal
JoinSpaceModal.tsx.description: Modal for joining spaces via invite codes or links
JoinSpaceModal.tsx.notes: COMPLETED: Business logic extracted into useSpaceJoining and useInviteValidation hooks. All raw HTML replaced with Container, FlexCenter, and Text primitives. Fully cross-platform compatible. TODO: Verify mobile UX in playground - confirm shared modal works well on mobile vs needing platform-specific native implementation.

LeaveSpaceModal.tsx.name: LeaveSpaceModal
LeaveSpaceModal.tsx.notes: COMPLETED: Business logic extracted into useSpaceLeaving hook with confirmation flow and timeout management. All raw HTML replaced with Container, Text, FlexRow, and other primitives. Fully cross-platform compatible with responsive text alignment. TODO: Verify mobile UX in playground - confirm shared modal works well on mobile vs needing platform-specific native implementation.

GlobalSearch.tsx.name: GlobalSearch
GlobalSearch.tsx.description: Global search component with context-aware search functionality
GlobalSearch.tsx.notes: Business logic extracted to 3 hooks. Uses Container primitive but still has minimal SCSS file with z-index positioning for web-specific layering.

SearchResults.tsx.name: SearchResults
SearchResults.tsx.description: Virtualized search results list with navigation
SearchResults.tsx.notes: Business logic extracted to 3 hooks. Uses only primitives (Container, Text, Icon, FlexCenter) but still has complex SCSS file and uses react-virtuoso for web-specific virtualization.

Message.tsx.name: Message
Message.tsx.description: Individual message component with reactions, replies, and interactions
Message.tsx.notes: Large component (likely 500+ lines) with emoji picker, reactions, replies, user profiles. Desktop: hover actions. Mobile: touch/drawer actions. Massive extraction needed.

Onboarding.tsx.name: Onboarding
Onboarding.tsx.description: User registration and onboarding flow with profile setup
Onboarding.tsx.notes: MOVED TO PLATFORM_SPECIFIC: Imports '_passkey-modal.scss' and 'react-dropzone', heavy Tailwind usage throughout. Complex registration logic with file upload, passkey integration (>10 lines, reusable).

Login.tsx.name: Login
Login.tsx.description: User login component with passkey authentication
Login.tsx.notes: MOVED TO PLATFORM_SPECIFIC: Imports '_passkey-modal.scss', heavy Tailwind usage throughout. Authentication logic with passkey integration (>10 lines, reusable). Uses Button primitive.

MobileDrawer.tsx.name: MobileDrawer
MobileDrawer.tsx.description: Legacy mobile drawer for web app mobile users (not native app)
MobileDrawer.tsx.notes: Comment clarifies: 'for mobile users using web app, native app uses primitives/Modal/Modal.native.tsx'. Uses FontAwesome + SCSS. Simple drawer logic.

ThemeProvider.tsx.name: ThemeProvider
ThemeProvider.tsx.description: Theme context provider with system/light/dark theme support
ThemeProvider.tsx.notes: Theme detection logic with localStorage + system theme detection (>10 lines, reusable). Context provider pattern works identically cross-platform.

ResponsiveLayoutProvider.tsx.name: ResponsiveLayoutProvider
ResponsiveLayoutProvider.tsx.description: Responsive layout context provider for screen size detection
ResponsiveLayoutProvider.tsx.notes: Simple context wrapper around useResponsiveLayout hook. Context pattern works identically cross-platform. Logic already in hook.

SpaceEditor.tsx.name: SpaceEditor
SpaceEditor.tsx.description: Complex space settings modal with permissions, roles, and file upload
SpaceEditor.tsx.notes: MOVED TO PLATFORM_SPECIFIC: Imports '../../styles/_modal_common.scss'. Uses many primitives but has SCSS dependencies. Business logic extraction already done.

ChannelEditor.tsx.name: ChannelEditor
ChannelEditor.tsx.notes: MOVED TO PLATFORM_SPECIFIC: Imports ../../styles/_modal_common.scss. Business logic extracted to useChannelManagement (channel CRUD, delete confirmation) and useChannelPermissions hooks. Now uses primitives (Modal, Container, FlexRow, Input, Button, Text, Icon) but retains SCSS dependency.

GroupEditor.tsx.name: GroupEditor
GroupEditor.tsx.description: Channel group creation and editing modal
GroupEditor.tsx.notes: MOVED TO PLATFORM_SPECIFIC: Imports ../../styles/_modal_common.scss. Business logic extracted to useGroupManagement hook (group CRUD, delete confirmation, message checking). Now uses primitives (Modal, Container, FlexRow, Input, Button, Text, Icon) but retains SCSS dependency.

EmojiPickerDrawer.tsx.name: EmojiPickerDrawer
EmojiPickerDrawer.tsx.description: Mobile emoji picker drawer for web app (not native app)
EmojiPickerDrawer.tsx.notes: Comment: 'for mobile users using web app, native app needs different emoji picker (React Native compatible)'. Uses MobileDrawer + EmojiPicker lib.

SearchResultItem.tsx.name: SearchResultItem
SearchResultItem.tsx.description: Individual search result item with message preview and navigation
SearchResultItem.tsx.notes: Business logic extracted to 4 hooks. Separated DM/Space logic to avoid hook rule violations. Uses only primitives (Container, Text, Icon, FlexBetween, FlexRow) but still has custom SCSS file with hover states and responsive styles.

DirectMessageContactsList.tsx.name: DirectMessageContactsList
DirectMessageContactsList.tsx.description: List of direct message conversations with refresh polling
DirectMessageContactsList.tsx.notes: Business logic extracted to useConversationPolling hook. All HTML elements replaced with primitives (Container, FlexColumn, FlexBetween, Icon). CSS optimized with Tailwind utilities. Still uses minimal SCSS for scrollbar styling so remains platform_specific. Native implementation still needed.

ExpandableNavMenu.tsx.name: ExpandableNavMenu
ExpandableNavMenu.tsx.description: Expandable navigation menu with create/join space actions
ExpandableNavMenu.tsx.notes: Uses Button primitive + FontAwesome + ReactTooltip. Desktop: expandable sidebar. Mobile: different navigation pattern. Simple toggle logic.

WebsocketProvider.tsx.name: WebsocketProvider
WebsocketProvider.tsx.notes: Complex WebSocket logic with connection management, message queuing (>10 lines, reusable). Context pattern works cross-platform.

QuorumApiContext.tsx.name: QuorumApiContext
QuorumApiContext.tsx.description: API client context provider with error handling and configuration
QuorumApiContext.tsx.notes: Complex API client configuration with error handling (>10 lines, reusable). Context pattern works cross-platform.

MessageDB.tsx.name: MessageDB
MessageDB.tsx.description: Message database context provider with encryption and caching
MessageDB.tsx.notes: Complex database logic with encryption, caching, key management (>10 lines, reusable). Context pattern works cross-platform.

RegistrationPersister.tsx.name: RegistrationPersister
RegistrationPersister.tsx.notes: Registration persistence logic with passkey integration (>10 lines, reusable). Uses Button primitive. Context pattern works cross-platform.

RedirectToDefaultSpace.tsx.name: RedirectToDefaultSpace
RedirectToDefaultSpace.tsx.notes: Entire component is commented out. Would use React Router Navigate - works cross-platform. Dead code candidate for removal.

stats.analysis_notes: MAJOR REFACTOR: AppWithSearch.tsx successfully split into 3 focused providers (ModalProvider, MobileProvider, SidebarProvider) with single responsibilities. Eliminated monolithic component mixing modal, mobile, and sidebar concerns. New providers maintain z-[9999] stacking solutions but still need business logic extraction to hooks. Architecture now follows separation of concerns principle.
